briefdescription.para: The ID in the ParticleList to create Particle from.

description.para: Methods which exist for backwards compatibility and are no longer in use or have never been in use

briefdescription.para: ctor
dtor
init
Override when getting debug information.
Validation whether an effect truly started playing or if the Effect should stop as none is present.

simplesect.para: Override this when inheriting to create own validation check
Is called from Event_OnStarted invoker after Event_OnStarted has been performed

briefdescription.para: Was never called and probably should never be called.

simplesect.para: Emptied the functionality as it is relatively unsafe...

description.para: Information about what type of effect the Effect is, without the need for casting

briefdescription.para: Check whether the Effect is EffectParticle without casting.

description.para: Set or get the main particle which this Effect will manage

parameterdescription.para: Particle Main particle which this Effect will manage

briefdescription.para: Gets the main particle which this Effect is managing.

simplesect.para: Particle Main particle which this Effect is managing

description.para: Methods to Play/Stop Effect Generally, SEffectManager.Play methods are used instead of Start

briefdescription.para: Plays all elements this effect consists of.

simplesect.para: Is called by SEffectManager.Play methods

briefdescription.para: Stops all elements this effect consists of.

simplesect.para: Alternatively use SEffectManager.Stop( effect_id )

description.para: Setters and getters for generic data and properties

briefdescription.para: Sets the id of the particle to be used.

simplesect.para: Only changes the cached variable, for immediate, use SetCurrentParticleID

parameterdescription.para: int Particle ID registered in ParticleList

briefdescription.para: Gets the id of the particle to be used.

simplesect.para: Only gets the cached variable, for immediate effect use GetCurrent variant
int Particle ID registered in ParticleList

simplesect.para: Particle will not update immediately, but ParticleSource will

parameterdescription.para: int Particle ID registered in ParticleList

briefdescription.para: Set orientation of the EffectParticle.

simplesect.para: Only sets the cached variable, for immediate effect use SetCurrent variant

parameterdescription.para: vector Orientation in degrees (yaw, pitch, roll)

briefdescription.para: Get the orientation of the EffectParticle.

simplesect.para: Only gets the cached variable, for immediate effect use GetCurrent variant
vector The orientation of EffectParticle

briefdescription.para: Set the current orientation of the managed Particle.

parameterdescription.para: vector Orientation in degrees (yaw, pitch, roll)

briefdescription.para: Get the current orientation of the managed Particle.

simplesect.para: vector The current orientation of the managed Particle

briefdescription.para: Set orientation setting to be used by the effect when the Effect starts.

simplesect.para: Only caches it into a variable to be used by Start, does not live update when called afterwards
There is no way to update this immediately

parameterdescription.para: bool Whether to keep WS orientation when attaching it to parent

briefdescription.para: Get the orientation setting to be used by the effect when the Effect starts.

simplesect.para: Only gets the cached variable, for immediate effect use IsParticleCurrentRotationRelativeToWorld
bool Whether to keep WS orientation when attaching it to parent

briefdescription.para: Get the current orientation setting to be used by the managed Particle.

simplesect.para: bool Whether the managed Particle is only updating position from parent

briefdescription.para: The main Particle effect that this Effect wrapper manages.
Wrapper class for managing particles through SEffectManager.
